Remove 3.4.1 logger workaround (adding package to default service). See
CORE-2436 on the liquibase tracker for more details
Fix springProfile with multi profiles separated by comma and whitespace

Fix springProfile with multi profiles separated by comma and whitespace
Previously springProfile supported multi profiles separated by comma but
it doesnt work if there are whitespaces. Now, springProfile will read
values cleaning whitespaces
Remove unused parameter in Security configuration

Remove unused parameter in Security configuration
Update SecurityFilterAutoConfiguration.securityFilterChainRegistration
to remove unused ApplicationContext parameter

Improve performance of RelaxedNames
Replace String.split() with a regex to save compiling the pattern
multiple times

Make SPRING_APPLICATION_JSON processing happen before config files
That way any properties that are needed for processing the config
files will be available in time. Makes sense given that env vars
is the main carrier of the inline JSON
Upgrade RestarterTests to expect listener to be notified at least once

Upgrade auto-configured ParameterNamesModule to use DEFAULT creator mode The PROPERTIES creator mode has the unfortunate side-effect of stopping mixins from working. This commit updates the auto-configured module to use the DEFAULT creator mode instead

Upgrade ShellPropertiesTests to expect whitespace to be trimmed The latest Spring Framework 4.2.3 snapshots appear to be trimming whitespace as part of the binding process. This commit updates the test's expectations accordingly

Add missing properties to OAuth2AutorizationServer
Make sure that `autoApprove`, `accessTokenValiditySeconds`, and
`refreshTokenValiditySeconds` properties from the `ClientDetails`
are used
Fix registration of shutdown handler as a shutdown hook
Use a random HTTP port when running SampleLiquibaseApplicationTests

The target attribute is effectively checked for null beforehand so this
additional defensive check can be removed
Fix customJodaDateTimeFormat to specify time zone when creating Date

Spring Framework 4.2 introduced support for before modes in

these new modes

Add relaxed names for enum test

when it is used as a map key
Add SQLServer XA DataSource class name

Use standard name for main thread
DevTools look for a main thread named "main". The maven plugin is
actually using a different value and there is no real reason to. This
change fixes DevTools support as long as forking is enabled

output:
Add ApplicationRunner support to CLI
Add ApplicationRunner and ApplicationArguments to the CLI compiler
auto-configuration

Add send count to Integration metrics
Fixed

Make GzipFilterAutoConfiguration conditional on HttpMethod
GzipFilterProperties uses HttpMethod so GzipFilterAutoConfiguration,
which uses GzipFilterProperties, needs to be conditional on HttpMethod
being on the classpath

Remove unnecessary import
Remove unnecessary `@After` callback

Remove unnecessary `@After` callback
`@After` callback was trying to remove the wrong file anyway. This is
now taken care of by the `TemporaryFolder` rule
Fix typo in test methods' names

Make EventPublishingRunListener Ordered `0`
Update EventPublishingRunListener to implement Ordered and use a default
order of 0. This allows for other run listeners to be added either
before or after it
Fix missing space in logging message
Add JDBC url to Driver class name mappings for DB2, Teradata and Firebird

Fix dependency of AmqpAdmin
AmqpAdmin does not require a CachingConnectionFactory. Using the more
general CachingConnectionFactory provides more flexibility

Fix CLI package tangle
Remove explicit TestFailedException catch in CommandRunner and instead
rely on the fact that TestFailedException extends CommandException

support is not present. The Hazelcast dependency alone may be used with

metrics infra

applied before the cache counter-part. Request the general
`redisTemplate` so that non String-values can be handled by default as
well

the cache auto-configuration itself

Add @Primary to default InMemoryMetricRepository if there is one

Fix broken RepackerTests on Windows
Update test to deal with the fact that POSIX operations aren't available
on Windows

Improve diagnostics in PublicMetricsAutoConfigurationTests
multipleCacheManagers fails on the CI server but does not fail
locally. This commit updates assertMetrics to include information
about the actual metrics so it's clear why the expectation was not
met

Fix failing Windows CI build

ehcache library is not present. This commit adds the missing

Remove the need for `commons-collections`

Fix wrong import in JCache auto-config
Remove the need for `commons-collections`
Fix incorrect property name The property in XADataSourceAutoConfigurationTests should be `data-source-class-name`. Previously the `-name` was missing

Add total space to disk health information

space and the configured threshold. This commit adds the disks total

Use file based loader with MockServletContext

Use a String when referencing a class with @ConditionalOnMissingClass
Using a Class reference can cause reflection problems at runtime ()

Fix automatic '/' -> 'index.html' forwarding to also work when a
`server.servlet-path` property is set
Fix name of solr health indicator
Fix wrong help page for archive detection logic

Remove incorrect assumption that output will be in folder named classes

folder named bin. This commit update the annotation processor to remove
the failure assumption that the output will always be located beneath
a folder named classes
Upgrade getSupportedSourceVersion() logic Use SourceVersion.latestSupported() rather than @SupportedSourceVersion since we might build with an earlier JDK

Remove superfluous `\n` when logging password

it

Make IntegrationTestPropertiesListener public
Make IntegrationTestPropertiesListener public so that it can be used
when @TestExecutionListeners are declared on a parent class

Fix potential Jetty MalformedURLException
Update JettyEmbeddedServletContainerFactory to use the JarResource
class to create the base resource. This prevents a potential
"java.lang.NullPointerException: no !/ in spec" error which can occur
when using shaded executable jars

Change additional metadata file lookup logic
Update ConfigurationMetadataAnnotationProcessor to find the additional
metadata json file using createResource rather than getResource. Prior
to this commit the file could be skipped when multiple files were
contained on the classpath
Fix test failure introduced in d4b75edf
Remove unnecessary Jetty secure config calls

Fix TemplateLocation.anyExists logic

local `searchPath` variable

Fix accidental fork logic change
Fix accidental change from commit b42c7fca

Fix TypeNotPresentExceptionProxy error with Mongo
Update MongoAutoConfiguration so that a TypeNotPresentExceptionProxy
error is not thrown when Spring Data Mongo is not used

Fix PersistenceExceptionTranslation INFO message
Update PersistenceExceptionTranslationAutoConfiguration so that the
PersistenceExceptionTranslation @Bean method is static

Fix Maven Spring Loaded detection logic
Ensure that the Maven plugin RunMojo attempts to detect the Spring
Loaded agent before deciding if the JVM should be forked

Fix banner NPE when when using the default package
Update ResourceBanner to protect against a null application package

Fix session timeout default value
Update DEFAULT_SESSION_TIMEOUT to use TimeUnit.MINUTES.toSeconds(30)
rather than TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMinutes(30) which would always return

Fix session timeout default value

Remove warnings for expected deprecation usage

Use constructor injection for Jersey sample

Uses raw class instead of Java Type API (which has a
default method in 1.8, unavailble in 1.7)

Upgrade JackonAutoConfiguration to apply all http.mappers properties Previously, only the http.mappers.json-sort-keys property was applied by JacksonAutoConfiguration. This commit updates it to also apply the http.mappers.json-pretty-print property as well

Add test for inaccessible configuration class

Add spring-boot-versions project

Fix ordering problem with Mongo autoconfig

Make OnExpressionCondition package private
(consistent with the other Condition implementations)
Fix samples that need jdbc and don't import it

Add ApplicationEventPublisher explicitly to security publisher
For some reason the exception mappings are only created with the
publisher is initialized in the constructor of DefaultAuthenticationEventPublisher.
Changed SpringBootWebSecurityConfiguration to do that rather then
relying on the ApplicationEventPublisherAware behaviour to inject it
Add extra test for nested list binding

Change logging level on PropertySourcesLoader
Reduce logging level to trace to remove the ugly output that appears
above the banner

Add further test for activating profiles
The new test asserts that a profile defined in one profile can be
switched off in another. Seems to work.
More
Add Environment to shell context; disable shell banner if spring.main.show_banner is set to false

Add endpoint command to shell
fixex
Add validation test to ws sample
Fix some broken tests in empty new environments
Change explicit bean type to concrete NamedParameterJdbcTemplate

Change bean name of ContentNegotiatingViewResolver
Fixed

Adapt auto-configuration code to use the new constructor introduced
in Spring Data Commons' AnnotationConfigurationSource
Upgrade ErrorMvcAutoConfiguration for Spring 4 Update ErrorMvcAutoConfiguration thymeleaf condition to use the `spring4` package
Change order of properties in endpoint mbean objectNames to make display in jconsole nicer
Fix sample (Exception type changed in Mongo)
Use non-deprecated API to create Mongo client

Improve exception messages on nested jar failure

Make SpringApplication list/initializers respect their Ordered

Fix CLI help formatting issue with '-cp'

Add hint to user about 'stop' command
Improves

Add missing YAML file for test
Add Spring MVC's org.springframework.ui package to the list of automatic imports

Fix PropertiesLauncher for wildcard entries in parent classpath
This small change now plays nice with wildcard classpath

Remove support for Integration DSL (milestone only)

Add instanceof check and nice fat error message
If Logback and another SLF4J implementation are both on the classpath
it is possible for the LogbackLoggingSystem to fail to locate
a LoggerContext. Rather than a ClassCastException it is better to
make an assertion with an error message
Add basic Banner to CLI Shell

Add extra condition to security properties config
Add build.gradle samples and rename runJar->bootRun
Add test for customize container factory
